question:
What is the increasing order of the wavelengths of the following colours?
1. Orange
2. Indigo
3. Yellow
4. Violet
explanation:
• Violet: 380–450 nm (688–789 THz frequency)
• Indigo: 450 - 425 nm
• Blue: 450–495 nm.
• Green: 495–570 nm.
• Yellow: 570–590 nm.
• Orange: 590–620 nm.
• Red: 620–750 nm (400–484 THz frequency)
